商品名稱: 波西米亞風花朵襯衫女裝復古印花T恤野花圖案襯衫花園愛好者短袖上衣
SKU: 尺寸: X-Large顏色: 灰色
留言內容: The design of this shirt is exactly as pictured. The sizing of the shirt is also true to size. I have washed this shirt a handful of times and the design and print have remained vibrant. Overall I would highly recommend this shirt.

商品名稱: 波西米亞風花朵襯衫女裝復古印花T恤野花圖案襯衫花園愛好者短袖上衣
SKU: 尺寸: XX-Large顏色: 米色
留言內容: I thought it was a printed on pattern but it has that rubbery feel to it which I don’t like personally.  Seems to be true to size.  Very soft once laundered.  Too short for leggings.  I’m short 5’3 and large around mid section.  I’m bust 38D, this is a size XL. I normally wear 14-16 so I would say this is true to size.  I would say the quality is good.  I washed it normal and hung to dry.  I would have given it 5 stars if the front pattern was printed on.

SKU: 尺寸: X-Large顏色: 灰色
留言內容: The design is really pretty but ironed on with a weird feel. Shirt is soft, fabric not bad but it's extremely short. Not a longer more flattering fit, more like halfway between a standard length t shirt and a crop top. Very strange length.

商品名稱: 波西米亞風花朵襯衫女裝復古印花T恤野花圖案襯衫花園愛好者短袖上衣
SKU: 尺寸: Large顏色: 灰色
留言內容: Washed and dried this shirt right away to see if it would shrink.  I wear a M/L I got a large.  Print was not affected by washing.  (Used cold wash dried medium heat inside out).  This shirt is wider, if you have a long torso, I wouldn’t recommend this shirt. I knot my tee to make it more fitting.
